channel.title: Tools on Prasenjit Manna
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Prasenjit Manna

item.title: How I use LLMs | Tools | Andrej Karpathy
item.description: How I use LLMs | Andrej Karpathy The example-driven, practical walkthrough of Large Language Models and their growing list of related features - by How I use LLMs | Andrej Karpathy Chapters 00:00:00 Intro into the growing LLM ecosystem 00:02:54 ChatGPT interaction under the hood 00:13:12 Basic LLM interactions examples 00:18:03 Be aware of the model you’re using, pricing tiers 00:22:54 Thinking models and when to use them 00:31:00 Tool use: internet search 00:42:04 Tool use: deep research 00:50:57 File uploads, adding documents to context 00:59:00 Tool use: python interpreter, messiness of the ecosystem 01:04:35 ChatGPT Advanced Data Analysis, figures, plots 01:09:00 Claude Artifacts, apps, diagrams 01:14:02 Cursor: Composer, writing code 01:22:28 Audio (Speech) Input/Output 01:27:37 Advanced Voice Mode aka true audio inside the model 01:37:09 NotebookLM, podcast generation 01:40:20 Image input, OCR 01:47:02 Image output - DALL-E, Ideogram, etc.
